topic_name: Green iron exports (DRI, HBI, hot metal, ESF pathways)
notes: Largest value uplift opportunity from existing iron ore strength

topic_name: Green aluminium (low-carbon alumina plus renewable-powered smelting, alloys)
notes: Combines strong bauxite and alumina base with decarbonisation premium

topic_name: Copper upgrading (refining plus semi-fab: rod, wire, foil)
notes: Moves exports from concentrates toward higher value copper products

topic_name: Rare earth separation to oxides (NdPr, Dy, Tb)
notes: Strategic leverage in magnet supply chains

topic_name: Green chemical feedstocks at scale (ammonia, methanol)
notes: Export product and input for domestic processing hubs

topic_name: Fertilisers and ag-inputs (potash, phosphate, finished fertilisers; low-carbon ammonia integration)
notes: Links mineral inputs with resilient food and chemical supply chains

topic_name: Uranium value lift toward fuel-cycle services via partnerships (policy-gated)
notes: Strategic upside exists but policy settings are decisive

topic_name: Silicon metal at scale (metallurgical silicon)
notes: High value intermediate for solar electronics and alloys

topic_name: Manganese upgrading (battery and alloying chemicals, EMM and HPMSM pathways)
notes: Creates higher margin products from existing ore base

topic_name: Graphite anode materials (purified spherical graphite, coated anode)
notes: Critical battery bottleneck with exportable processed outputs

topic_name: Permanent magnets (NdFeB): metals, alloys, magnet manufacturing
notes: High geopolitical leverage and high qualification barrier

topic_name: Battery-grade lithium chemicals (hydroxide, carbonate where viable)
notes: Builds on existing spodumene position and processing footprint

topic_name: Lithium beyond hydroxide: lithium metal, electrolyte salts (LiPF6), specialty lithium chemicals
notes: Higher value but more demanding qualification and technology risk

topic_name: Cathode materials: pCAM and CAM
notes: Captures more battery chain value with strong offtake dependence

topic_name: Nickel and cobalt sulphates (battery-grade)
notes: Downstream conversion aligns with battery supply chain demand

topic_name: Vanadium chemicals and electrolyte for flow batteries and long-duration storage
notes: Niche but strategically useful long duration storage segment

topic_name: High-purity alumina and specialty alumina products
notes: Strong adjacency to alumina base and electronics demand

topic_name: High-purity silica and specialty quartz (PV, semiconductor supply chains)
notes: Strategic input with geology and processing quality constraints

topic_name: Green polysilicon (solar-grade, wafers over time)
notes: Potentially large but energy and capex intensive pathway

topic_name: Titanium metal and powders (aerospace, defence, additive manufacturing)
notes: High value and strategic but qualification cycle is long

topic_name: High-purity copper and specialty alloys (beyond basic rod and wire)
notes: Extension of copper upgrading with tighter quality requirements

topic_name: Defence-grade materials supply chains (qualified steels, armour inputs, magnets, Ti powders, qualified alloys)
notes: Leverage comes from qualification and trusted supply status

topic_name: Ore upgrading and beneficiation as a service (pelletisation, impurity removal, other ores)
notes: Cross-cutting enabler improving export grade and project economics

topic_name: Firmed clean power platform for industry (generation, transmission, storage, power quality)
notes: Non-negotiable enabler for low-carbon processing competitiveness

topic_name: Hydrogen production and industrial clean energy inputs (primarily as enabler)
notes: Important to some pathways but project economics remain context specific

topic_name: Industrial reagents platform (acids, caustic, soda ash, lime) tied to hubs
notes: Gates processing reliability and throughput across multiple chains

topic_name: Fluorine and phosphate reagent chains (explicit gating sub-platform)
notes: Disproportionate gating effect on battery and specialty chemical chains

topic_name: Traceability, certification, MRV, and product passports (market access infrastructure)
notes: Supports premium access and trusted supplier positioning

topic_name: Green premium market infrastructure (offtake structuring, trading, price discovery, long-term contracting)
notes: Needed to monetise low-carbon attributes and reduce revenue volatility

topic_name: Strategic logistics and certified supply ports (QA labs, blending, dedicated terminals, inventory)
notes: Concentrates capability and lowers transaction friction

topic_name: Mining services and EPC export (modular processing plants, commissioning, maintenance)
notes: Builds exportable capability beyond physical commodity flows

topic_name: Industrial control software and optimisation for processing and green metals (exportable capability)
notes: Digital layer can scale across multiple mineral value chains

topic_name: Strategic reserves and stockpile services (governance, storage, QA, financing)
notes: Strategic function with limited direct export revenue

topic_name: Industrial CCS hubs and CO2 transport and storage (protect export competitiveness)
notes: Defensive enabler for emissions-intensive anchors

topic_name: Antimony (oxide and metal refining)
notes: Defence and industrial choke point with concentrated supply

topic_name: Gallium recovery and refining (byproduct-led strategy)
notes: Byproduct pathway can leverage existing alumina and zinc systems

topic_name: Germanium recovery and refining (byproduct-led strategy)
notes: High strategic relevance in electronics and optics

topic_name: Indium recovery and refining (byproduct-led strategy)
notes: Strategic but limited scale and feedstock concentration risk

topic_name: Selenium and tellurium recovery (copper refining byproducts)
notes: Natural adjacency to copper refinery byproduct streams

topic_name: Tungsten intermediates and powders (APT, metal powders)
notes: High value density and defence relevance

topic_name: Tin refining and solder-grade products
notes: Electronics relevance and manageable process pathway

topic_name: Bismuth refining and compounds (byproduct)
notes: Useful niche but smaller market depth

topic_name: Specialty cobalt and nickel metal products (high-purity rounds, powders)
notes: Moves from salts into higher-value specialty forms

topic_name: Specialty phosphates and purified phosphoric acid (non-fertiliser grades)
notes: Cross-sector demand in chemicals and energy materials

topic_name: Boron products and advanced borates (specialty chemicals)
notes: Smaller but strategic specialty chemical opportunity

topic_name: High-performance carbon materials (synthetic graphite, needle coke, carbon fibres)
notes: Strategic potential with high technology and cost barriers

topic_name: Advanced refractories and furnace consumables (green iron, copper, alumina enablement)
notes: Enables anchor processes with moderate export upside

topic_name: Battery recycling and urban mining (domestic loop plus regional feedstock)
notes: Exportable if linked to regional feedstock and recovered products

topic_name: Black mass import processing hub for Asia-Pacific
notes: Regional feedstock model can create processing scale quickly

topic_name: Regional recycling hub services model (contracting, logistics, QA, compliance)
notes: Service-led model depends on long-term contract aggregation

topic_name: Battery separator materials (specialty polymers)
notes: High qualification and incumbent competition barriers

topic_name: Battery binder materials (PVDF and alternatives)
notes: Strategic relevance but complex chemistry and qualification curve

topic_name: Electrolyte solvents (DMC, EMC, DEC) and additive packages
notes: Requires deep chemical integration and qualified offtake

topic_name: Electrolyte formulation and qualification capability (OEM-facing)
notes: Capability play with slower commercialisation

topic_name: Anode and cathode precursor supply chain QA and metrology (reference materials, test protocols)
notes: Valuable trust layer but indirect revenue path

topic_name: Precision metallurgical testing, certification labs, and reference material production
notes: Fast build adjacency and exportable services capability

topic_name: Commodity finance and project finance capability packaged for green metals
notes: Can unlock projects but depends on market and policy certainty

topic_name: Subsea and cryogenic logistics supply chain (CO2, hydrogen carriers, ammonia terminals) leveraging LNG adjacency
notes: Strong adjacency but large capex and sequencing risk

topic_name: Industrial gases expansion tied to hubs (oxygen, nitrogen, argon; cryogenics)
notes: Essential operating enabler with moderate standalone export value

topic_name: Industrial water as a gating enabler for hubs (constraint item, not export thesis)
notes: Retained as build constraint and site selection condition
